name: Anki Jisho Connect
description: Anki Add-on that automates Japanese-English dictionary lookups using Jisho.org, allowing users to search Japanese terms and automatically fill card fields with definitions, readings, meanings, and other information. Provides advanced configuration, field mapping, multi-selection support, and streamlines efficient note creation for study.
author: Grakinn
license_observations: Free for anyone to use, modify, and distribute for any purpose, provided credit is given to the original author (Grakinn).
